name: 楊勝明
objective: 無刷直流及永磁同步電動機具有高效率、高功率-質量比，在家電、工業設備、及電動車輛產業都已被廣泛的應用，為目前最主要的動力馬達。本課程從基本的磁路分析及永久磁鐵開始，首先介紹無刷直流的運轉原理及控制方法，然後探討永磁同步電動機之控制理論，及驅動電路技術，最後說明控制系統實現及無轉軸位置感測器控制的方法。
schedule:
1. Electromagnetic energy conversion
2. PM and magnetic circuit
3. BLDC basics
4. Stator and rotor design
5. Stator and rotor design
6. Motor drive and control
7. BLDC sensorless control
8. PMSM basics , Mid-term exam
9. Complex vector transformation
10. Mathematical model
11. Vector control, Maximum torque control
12. Current control
13. Sinusoidal PWM
14. Space Vector PWM
15. Initial position sensing
16. Sensorless vector control
17. Sensorless vector control
18. Final exam
scorePolicy:
Home works: 30%
Mid-term exam: 35%
Final exam: 35%
materials:
1.Brushless Permanent Motor Design, 2nd Edition, by Duane Hanselman.
2.Brushless Motors - Magnetic Design, Performance, and Control, by Duane Hanselman, 2012.
3.Permanent Magnet Synchronous and Brushless DC Motor Drives, by Ramu Krishnan, CRC 
Press 2010.
4.Control of Electric Machine Drive Systems, Seung-Ki Sul, IEEE Press, 2012.
